hotels.name: Moku Canouan
hotels.desc: Luxury island resort, Grenadines gem, exclusive Caribbean experience
hotels.longDesc: A premier resort in the Grenadines offering luxury Caribbean hospitality with pristine beaches and island exclusivity.
hotels.address: VC, Carenage Bay, Canouan Island VC0450, St Vincent and the Grenadines

hotels.name: Beachcombers Hotel
hotels.desc: Waterfront hotel in heart of capital, convenient location, ocean views, friendly staff
hotels.longDesc: A welcoming beachfront hotel perfect for families exploring Kingstown. Close to shops, restaurants, and local attractions with easy access to island adventures.
hotels.address: Villa Beach, Villa, St Vincent and the Grenadines

hotels.name: Sugar Reef Bequia - Adults only
hotels.desc: Island resort with beach access, water sports, relaxed Caribbean vibe, family suites
hotels.longDesc: A charming beachfront resort on Bequia island offering direct beach access and water activities. Perfect for families seeking a relaxed tropical escape with excellent service.
hotels.address: Belmont Rd, Crescent Beach VC, 2QGM+62V Bequia Island, VC0400, St Vincent and the Grenadines

hotels.name: Young Island Resort
hotels.desc: Private island resort, secluded elegance, water sports, romantic setting, all-inclusive options
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive private island resort offering ultimate seclusion and luxury. Families can enjoy pristine beaches, water activities, and world-class amenities in a paradise setting.
hotels.address: 4QJX+G5G, Arnos Vale, St Vincent and the Grenadines

hotels.name: Rosewood Apartment Hotel
hotels.desc: Ultra-luxury resort, private villas, spa, gourmet dining, pristine beaches, Caribbean elegance
hotels.longDesc: A world-class luxury resort featuring elegant private villas and exceptional service. Perfect for families seeking indulgent comfort with direct beach access and fine amenities.
hotels.address: Saint George, Rose Cottage Road, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Basil's Bar
restaurants.desc: Famous beachfront eatery, fresh seafood, casual island vibes, sunset views, local favorite
restaurants.longDesc: An iconic beachfront restaurant beloved by locals and visitors alike. Families enjoy fresh seafood, relaxed atmosphere, and stunning sunset views over the Caribbean Sea.
restaurants.address: VRJ6+7PX, Lovell, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: French Verandah
restaurants.desc: Colonial charm café, local coffee, pastries, shaded veranda, perfect lunch spot
restaurants.longDesc: A charming colonial-style café serving excellent local coffee and fresh pastries. Families appreciate the relaxed atmosphere and shaded outdoor seating ideal for tropical dining.
restaurants.address: 4RJ2+V5R, Villa Stretch, Arnos Vale, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Sunset Cove
restaurants.desc: Fine dining establishment, Caribbean cuisine, ocean views, elegant ambiance, special occasions
restaurants.longDesc: An upscale restaurant featuring authentic Caribbean cuisine with spectacular ocean views. Families can enjoy a special dining experience with impeccable service and refined dishes.
restaurants.address: JH43+52Q, Ashton, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Friendship House
restaurants.desc: Casual seafood spot, grilled catch of the day, beachside location, friendly service, local eats
restaurants.longDesc: A laid-back beachside seafood restaurant where families enjoy fresh grilled fish and Caribbean specialties. Known for authentic local flavors and welcoming island hospitality.
restaurants.address: Friendship House Friendship Bequia, XQV7+G53, Port Elizabeth, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: The Cobblestone Inn
restaurants.desc: Stone-walled courtyard serving fresh fish and local dishes
restaurants.address: 5Q3G+77G, Bay St, Kingstown, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Mac's Pizza & Kitchen
restaurants.desc: Family-friendly pizzeria on the waterfront in Port Elizabeth
restaurants.address: Port Elizabeth, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Gingerbread Hotel Bequia
restaurants.desc: Waterfront dining in historic gingerbread house with fresh seafood
restaurants.address: Port Elizabeth, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: De Reef Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.desc: Beachside cafe with Caribbean BBQ and casual atmosphere
restaurants.address: Lower Bay Rd, Bequia, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Vee Jay's Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.desc: Local Caribbean spot with rooftop views and rotis
restaurants.address: Lower Bay Street (Opposite Bay, View Carpark, Kingstown, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Flow Wine Bar and Kitchen
restaurants.desc: Morning coffee and pastries in Villa
restaurants.address: James St, Kingstown, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: The Fig Tree
restaurants.desc: Garden restaurant with Caribbean classics in Lower Bay
restaurants.address: Port Elizabeth, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Fernando's Hideaway
restaurants.desc: Hillside Italian restaurant with harbor views
restaurants.address: XQX4+5WM, Port Elizabeth, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: The Loft Restaurant and Bar
restaurants.desc: Caribbean fusion dining with local art in Villa area
restaurants.address: VC0120, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Greenhouse Café Bequia
restaurants.desc: Local coffee shop with fresh roasted beans and pastries
restaurants.address: Port Elizabeth, St Vincent and the Grenadines

restaurants.name: Keegans Beachside Hotel, Apartments and Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Sunset dining on Lower Bay beach with fresh catch specials
restaurants.photoAttribution: Keegans Beachside Hotel, Apartments and Restaurant
restaurants.address: Bay St, St Vincent and the Grenadines

experiences.name: Fort Charlotte
experiences.desc: Historic 18th century fortress, panoramic views, cultural significance, interactive history exhibits
experiences.longDesc: An impressive historic fort offering panoramic views of Kingstown and the coast. Families explore fascinating colonial history while enjoying magnificent vistas and educational exhibits.
experiences.address: 5Q55+65C, Clare Valley, St Vincent and the Grenadines

experiences.name: Botanical Gardens
experiences.desc: Lush tropical gardens, exotic plants, peaceful walking paths, bird watching, nature retreat
experiences.longDesc: Beautiful tropical gardens featuring rare plants and exotic flowers. Families enjoy leisurely walks through serene landscapes with opportunities for bird watching and nature discovery.
experiences.address: 5Q7C+7VM New Montrose, & St Vincent, Kingstown, St Vincent and the Grenadines

experiences.name: La Soufrière Volcano
experiences.desc: Active volcano hike, geothermal features, sulfur springs, adventure trek, natural wonder
experiences.longDesc: An active volcano offering thrilling hikes with breathtaking crater views and geothermal features. Adventurous families experience nature's power while hiking through lush mountain scenery.
experiences.address: 8RP9+428, Georgetown, St Vincent and the Grenadines

experiences.name: Bequia Heritage Museum
experiences.desc: Island history museum, artifacts, cultural exhibits, educational displays, rainy day activity
experiences.longDesc: An engaging museum showcasing the rich history and culture of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. Families learn about indigenous heritage, colonial history, and local traditions through interactive exhibits.

experiences.name: Lower Bay
experiences.desc: Scenic beach on Bequia's southern coast with restaurants and water sports
experiences.address: Lower Bay, St Vincent and the Grenadines

experiences.name: Villa Beach
experiences.desc: Popular public beach near Kingstown with calm waters and local atmosphere
experiences.address: 4QMX+X26, Arnos Vale, St Vincent and the Grenadines

experiences.name: Jack's Beach Bar, Bequia
experiences.desc: Beachfront bar and restaurant at Princess Margaret Beach serving drinks and local food
experiences.address: Princess Margaret Beach, Port Elizabeth, St Vincent and the Grenadines

experiences.name: Frangipani Hotel
experiences.desc: Waterfront restaurant at Frangipani Hotel known for Thursday night jump-ups and Caribbean cuisine
experiences.address: Admiralty Harbour Bequia Island, Port Elizabeth, St Vincent and the Grenadines

kidFriendly.name: Princess Margaret Beach
kidFriendly.desc: Family-friendly beach with calm waters, soft sand, beach bars, shallow swimming, picnic areas
kidFriendly.longDesc: A perfect family beach with calm, shallow waters ideal for young children. The sandy shores offer safe swimming, beach bars, and plenty of space for building sandcastles.
kidFriendly.address: Charter yacht Atlantis II, St Vincent and the Grenadines

markets.name: Kingstown Fish Market
markets.desc: Bustling waterfront market, fresh seafood, local produce, authentic island experience, vibrant atmosphere
markets.longDesc: A lively waterfront market offering fresh catches, local vegetables, and island goods. Families experience authentic Caribbean culture while browsing colorful produce and meeting friendly vendors.
markets.address: 5Q3F+P86, Kingstown, St Vincent and the Grenadines

a.name: Saint Vincent Family Island Escape (7 Days)
a.description: Explore volcanic peaks, pristine beaches, and colorful markets on this Caribbean gem designed for families with young children seeking adventure and relaxation.
